backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles and full article CRUD with permission checks, published filtering, and admin access controls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features, related files, components, and tests with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing key frontend files, their responsibilities, and recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme configuration defining light/dark variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining public and admin routes wrapped in layout and theme providers.
Slug input component enforcing URL-safe validation and uniqueness with visual feedback.
Tag editing component allowing adding and removing tags with input and badge UI.
frontend/src/components/articles/Article: Reusable article list rendering cards with cleaned markdown excerpts, metadata, and tag badges.
frontend/src/components/articles/TagFilt: Renders a tag-based filter bar with selectable badges and a clear button. Calls a callback when tags are toggled.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with an icon and a button linking back home. Accepts an optional custom message.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking authentication, admin status, and profile completion. Shows loaders, access-denied screens, or a profile setup modal as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and retry logic. Clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name. Validates input and triggers a mutation to save the user profile.
frontend/src/components/content/Markdown: Parses a subset of Markdown into React elements, supporting paragraphs, headers, images, lists, and code blocks. Safely handles empty or invalid content.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, footer, and login button. Dynamically adds admin navigation when authenticated.
frontend/src/config/publicContact.ts: Exports centralized public contact links including email, LinkedIn, and GitHub.
frontend/src/content/articleTemplates.ts: Defines article template structures and provides predefined articles with metadata and content. Used as static reference material for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing admin access when available. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, handling identity loading, login, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, authorization checks, and article CRUD operations via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme with custom color variables, dark mode settings, typography rules, and a styled CTA component.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing mission, governance research, recruitment focus, and contact links.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin interface to list, publish, delete, and recreate articles, including template publishing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ArticleEditorPa: Enables creating and editing articles with templates, slug management, tags, and publish controls.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a public article by slug with loading/error states, metadata, markdown content, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesIndexPage.tsx: Displays published articles with search and tag filtering, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation links.
frontend/src/utils/articleDate.ts: Safely converts and formats backend nanosecond timestamps into valid JavaScript dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin support with extended theme settings.
